title: connection error
body: Anyone else not able to log in? I keep getting to the logging on part, then i get a connection error. I've tried everything that was on the link in the error and still nothing...

Hey all,

This is probably due to the login issues that we have been experiencing this morning so far.  I made a new sticky post where you can get the latest information and updates about this which you can find here:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/kajsGIQ6-why-cant-i-login-rito-pls

Since last night when a lot of people got instantly DC'd from games. My friend and I tried to reconnect, and our clients crashed at the loading screen. So we waited a couple hours. We tried making bot matches and making new games, and the same issue is still happening even now. We get a black screen just before the loading screen and the client crashes.

Any idea what this may be? Thanks for trying to help!~

Hi guys,

Riot have just updated that the issue should now be resolved: http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na


> RiotMasterCheese – a few seconds ago
> We have performed some network configuration changes that appear to have resolved this issue. We will continue to monitor the situation to ensure that everything is working correctly.

> 44 minutes ago
> RiotMasterCheese — We're aware of problems related to logging into the NA platform and are working with our partner on getting these resolved. Earlier today we experienced issues with a major national backbone provider, causing many players to experience connection issues to our platform. We're also checking the health of our own infrastructure, but at this moment we believe the issue is related to the provider's infrastructure.


Looks like it should've been fixed as of a few seconds ago - might be worth trying to get your game on! :-)
Would like to see some news about these issues being resolved.
Same problem...

I have the same problem, I keep logging on and getting connection error. I keep track every time and the most I have ever gotten is thirty-seven! And even if I get past the connection error part, half the time I have a "Chat Service Error" and I can't talk to anyone and it wont let me play the game. We keep getting new updates on L.O.L. but none of them ever fix this problem. Which is ridiculous considering all of the people that claim to have the same problem. A lot of my friends that play L.O.L. have given up on it because it takes to long to get in, so seriously, fix the problem riot please. 0_o

I'm having the same problem. I can't login, I get stuck with the "Logging in..." and few min later get the "unable to connect to pvp.net" error.

Now my friends on EUW are experiencing the same in game lag and disconnects that occurred before being unable to log in entirely. It seems to me that a slow wave of server takedowns are moving slowly west across the globe. DDoS?
